nodes.bodyText: Why not just ask for GeneratedFileSystemResourceBuildItem when augmenting dev mode?
I don't think you need these changes if you remove GeneratedFileSystemResourceHandledBuildItem

That doesn't work, because then FileSystemResourcesBuildStep doesn't get the chance to do the actual writing of the resources.
That means that the Kubernetes Process does run and it does create the proper FileSystemResourcesBuildStep objects, but no code takes care of writing them.
We could move the code that writes the result outside of the build, but I don't like it that much.
WDYT?
Ah, I see why it needed now. Sorry for the noise
